name: I fell from Grace
description: I fell from Grace is a retro style adventure game, that blends storytelling and puzzle solving in a branching narrative style. Can you solve the mystery of the strange gift that has cured your wife of terminal illness, but unleashes sinister events before it's too late?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 850 MB available space
